resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: In Anᵒ: 1618. in a single Combat after I had given my Enimye his life, by an unhappye blowe I loste yᵉ use of my right hande wᶜʰ makes me write now soe ill wᵗʰ yᵉ lefte, but to recompence soe greate a losse my good god blest me wᵗʰ a most happye hopefull spouse, yᵉ love of my life & comfort of my dayes, La Bella mia dolce cuore.
resource.chars: In Anᵒ: 1618. in a single Combat after I had given my Enimye his life, by an unhappye blowe I loste yᵉ use of my right hande wᶜʰ makes me write now soe ill wᵗʰ yᵉ lefte, but to recompence soe greate a losse my good god blest me wᵗʰ a most happye hopefull spouse, yᵉ love of my life & comfort of my dayes, La Bella mia dolce cuore.
